Key Match Events: Stephen Curry's driving layup was partially blocked, but Kevon Looney had a put-back layup.
Hield connected on a right-wing 3-pointer, giving Golden State a seven-point edge with 46.3 seconds left.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Warriors coach Steve Kerr was booed by the TD Garden crowd that showed its displeasure over how he used Tatum at the Paris Olympics.
Others: Jayson Tatum led Boston (7-2) with 32 points, and Derrick White had 26 with six rebounds.
Andrew Wiggins also added 16 points for Golden State (7-1).
Boston forward Jaylen Brown missed his third straight game with a strained left hip flexor. Warriors guard Brandin Podziemski was out with an illness.
